column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Find Your Inner Strength
#Text=This article is n't about being strong and defending yourself .
#Text=It 's about showing your INNER strength which means emotion and power .
#Text=NOT FINISHED YET !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Overcoming Self-Destructive Behaviour
#Text=Learn to love how you are .
#Text=If someone does n't like you , then who cares ?
#Text=You are YOU and you should love yourself more and more each day .
#Text=You do n't have to be similar to everyone .
#Text=Being different is the most important thing of all .
#Text=To be very healthy , DO NOT smoke .
#Text=Smoking is so bad for your health , and can lead to lung cancer and loss/shortage of life .
#Text=It 's very hard to stop when you 've already started .
#Text=When you eat too much junk food , your body may not like it .
#Text=Soon you may become fatter and no one likes that !
#Text=To be slim eat fruit , vegetables , and meat .
#Text=Anything like chocolate , cake , and chips are bad for your health , and can damage your body .
#Text=Refined sugars and saturated fats are health disasters waiting to happen !
#Text=Try to avoid getting sick .
#Text=If you see someone who has caught a cold , do n't get too close to them .
#Text=Try to avoid getting cancer or breaking a leg , and be careful where you head ! Falling down the stairs , on the road , dropping from a building .
#Text=Be SO careful !
#Text=Lastly , if someone you hate or a bully tries to hurt you in some way , STAY AWAY .
#Text=If you are so close to them , then act nice to them .
#Text=Bullies hate when you do that .
#Text=If nothing works , try a compliment .
#Text=If it still wo n't work , then you must defend yourself with your INNER strength and FAITH .
#Text=Fighting Health Challenges
#Text=Take very good care of your health .
#Text=There are many kind of causes out there causing injury , so look out for them !
#Text=If you SO BADLY want to lose wait , and feel stronger , go on health shows and challenges .
#Text=Usually people drop half their weight or more .
#Text=Some medicine can help your muscles .
#Text=Also , milk can help your muscles grow .
#Text=But , inner strength is when your emotions help you become strong .
#Text=It happens !
#Text=Everyone knows drugs are bad for you , but medical drugs are ok .
#Text=They help your body and can clear yourself from cancer .
#Text=Maybe you could stop the health challenges and diets and stuff .
#Text=Instead , be yourself .
#Text=Strength is n't everything , and soon one day you may not be strong , but you wo n't turn into a bully .
#Text=Sometimes things like this happen , so watch out !
#Text=Powering Through Loss
#Text=When a very well loved person dies , it is hard not to cry .
#Text=But , to help you power on and stop worrying , you could maybe talk to a friend or family member .
#Text=Another thing to do is to write about it and express your feelings in journals and diaries .
#Text=Soon , it wo n't sound so bad , and you wo n't be teared up in agony anymore .
#Text=If you are still crying and do n't know what to do , try remembering all your cherished moments with that particular person in your life .
#Text=You will always remember the person who helped you get through life , be happy after tears , and make you feel good about yourself .
#Text=Sharing your story with others can help you feel better .
#Text=Talking about it to a teacher , friends , and your parents can help you soften those tears .
#Text=If all else fails , and you are still teared up in sadness , pretend that he/she is still living .
#Text=Daydream/dream/act out plays and stories of how he/she is still living and as good as ever .
#Text=Then , he/she would n't be in his/her grave , after all !
#Text=He/she will be with you only .
#Text=Moving Past Disabilities
#Text=There are many ways to show people that you are in pain .
#Text=I will tell you how to feel better about the way that you are in pain and misfortune .
#Text=Some painful stuff include :
#Text=Wheelchair
#Text=Crutches
#Text=Blood
#Text=Crying
#Text=Wheelchairs are used for people who ca n't walk anymore .
#Text=If you ca n't walk and you are in a wheelchair , people may stare at you .
#Text=If you ca n't ride a wheelchair well , get a best friend or family member to help you wheel along .
#Text=People use crutches when they can walk , but it hurts .
#Text=If crutches is the way to go , do n't feel too bad .
#Text=If you find it hard to hop for so long , get someone to help you while you are hopping .
#Text=Maybe , they can help you hop on your foot .
#Text=Hold you while you hop , so you do n't fall over .
#Text=Blood is painful , and can be red , but also maroon .
#Text=To fix blood pouring down your legs or arms or stuff , get a bandage or a band-aid ( bandage would be better ) and wrap it around where your blood is .
#Text=Remember to change your bandage once a day or it may stick there forever !
#Text=Soon , when it does n't hurt anymore , get rid of the bandages , and you 're fine !
#Text=Crying can tell that something is wrong .
#Text=Everyone cries sometime , and crying can bring lots of attention .
#Text=Feeling lost ?
#Text=Broke your leg ?
#Text=Your life is horrible ?
#Text=Many people will usually come to your rescue .
#Text=And when you tell them about your pain , they will almost always help .
#Text=Crying is nothing to be ashamed of , and can save your life sometimes !
#Text=Accepting the New Normal
#Text=Being different is important , and no one is the same .
#Text=Blonde , brunette , red , black , green , purple , grey , white hair .
#Text=Blue , green , yellow , grey , orange , hazel eyes .
#Text=You could have green hair , white eyes , and wear crazy clothes , and you could be known as beautiful .
#Text=It does n't matter what you where , as long as it 's something !
